name: Inquisitor
notes: Graphical issues in Inquisitor (red squares painted on the screen). More info here: https://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=32490

files.inquisitor: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- inquisitor: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Inquisitor/GameData/Inquisitor.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: inquisitor
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: staging-1.9.19-i386
